gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 121, Nets 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Nets, 121-100. Pascal Siakam led Indiana with 28 points, 11 rebounds, and four assists as Aaron Nesmith (16 points, four rebounds) and Tyrese Haliburton (14 points, seven rebounds, four assists) totaled 30 points. Cam Thomas led Brooklyn with 22 points and eight rebounds. The Pacers improve to 38-30 as the Nets move to 26-41.
